newsitem.title: USA: Mobil says Illinois refinery unit idled.
newsitem.headline: Mobil says Illinois refinery unit idled.

text.p: A brief fire idled a 65,000 barrel per day catalytic hydrodesulphurization unit at Mobil Corp's Joliet, Ill., refinery, a spokeswoman said on Monday.
The fire, which was extinguished by refinery firefighters in about 20 minutes, should have no impact on deliveries from the 188,000 barrel per day refinery, the spokeswoman said.
"We don't anticipate any impact on supplies," she said.
